dataList.title: Molar Teknecilik
dataList.content: Ah... Burada canlı canlı buharlanıyorum...
Ağır iç çekişler ve yengeç kabuklarının çatlama sesleri; yeşil, çamurlu düzlüğü dolduruyordu.

dataList.title: Molar Teknecilik
dataList.content: Hadi, çık artık... Çık artık!
Çocuğun zorlu homurtularının beraberinde, çamurlu düzlüğün üzerine bir metal parçası sıçradı.
O da, 2 adet çöp yengecinin boyunu geçen yığının üzerine eklenmişti.

dataList.title: Molar Teknecilik
dataList.content: Şu çocuk nereye kaçtı...? Yeni bir araba yapacağını değil, yeni bir araba alacağını düşünüyordum.

dataList.title: Molar Teknecilik
dataList.content: Aman, neyse. Bir molaya ihtiyacım var...
Alnındaki teri sildi ve eskisine kıyasla daha işlevli olan çöp yengecinin, kabuğunun üzerine kendisini bıraktı.
Susuzluğunu yatıştırmak için, ağzını atı ve yanında getirdiği matarayı ağzına doğru getirdi... Sonrasında suratını astı.

dataList.title: Molar Teknecilik
dataList.content: Ne... İçerisinde buzlu su yok muydu? Neden bu kadar ılık?

dataList.title: Molar Boatworks
dataList.content: Besides... Pah! It's salty... Ugh, the top must've come loose or something.
The child glowered at the canteen, at the lake, then back at the canteen. She again sighed deeply, and dumped the entire canteen on her head.
She probably thought that the water would at least cool her down.

dataList.title: Molar Boatworks
dataList.content: Haah... How much longer do I have to keep doing this crap?
Brushing through her now soaked hair, the child began to contemplate.
She was thinking back... back to when she first woke up on this mudflat.
She was glad that she was able to come back from the books, but it was unfortunate that she couldn't choose where to come back to.
Of course, the child didn't have a penny to her name... and even before she could find her bearings, she noticed a trash crab aggressively crawling toward her.
All she could do was to face it, completely unarmed.
Perhaps her Fixer days weren't for naught, after all.
Watching her beat down a trash crab with her bare hands, the owners of nearby boatworks offered to buy the scraps off her quarry...

dataList.title: Molar Boatworks
dataList.content: ...It's thanks to their help that we were at least able to open our own boatworks.

dataList.title: Molar Boatworks
dataList.content: And whew, even that would've been a challenge, had the other guys not returned as well.
The child's goal was to return to V Corp, District 22.
Back to where their office used to be... To get their old lives back.

dataList.title: Molar Boatworks
dataList.content: ...Still a ways to go to earn enough for the ride back.

dataList.title: Molar Boatworks
dataList.content: Phooey, I'm wasting time. The wagon'll get here at some point, I might as well kill some more crabs until then.
She dove back into the lake after muttering to herself.
She whispered, aiming her weapon at the trash crab hiding in the depths of the lake.

dataList.title: Molar Boatworks
dataList.content: Sit still... No use strugglin'!
